Verses: 1 muththiraipottavargal Yaarendraal: Agaliyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Thirshaadhaa Ennum Negemiyaa, Sidhegiyaa,
9 leviyaraagiya Asaniyaavin Kumaaran Yesuvaa, Enaadhaadhin Kumaararil Oruvanaagiya Pinnooyi, Kadhmiyel Enbavargalum,
10 avargal Sagodhararaagiya Sepaniyaa, Odhiyaa, Kelidhaa, Pelaayaa, Aanaan,
14 janaththin Thalaivaraagiya Paarosh, Paagaadhmovaab, Elaam, Saththoo, Paani,

28 janangalil Matravargalaagiya Aasaariyarum, Leviyarum Vaasal Kaavalaalarum, Paadagarum, Nidhaneemiyarum, Dhesangalin Janangalaivittup Pirindhu Vilagi Dhevanudaiya Nyaayappramaanaththukkuth Thirumbina Anaivarum Avargal Manaivigalum, Avargal Kumaararum Avargal Kumaaraththigalumaagiya Arivum Buththiyum Ullavargalellaarum,

29 thangalukkup Periyavargalaagiya Thangal Sagodhararode Koodikkondu: Dhevanudaiya Dhaasanaagiya Moseyaikkondu Kodukkappatta Dhevanudaiya Nyaayappramaanaththinpadi Nadandhukolvom Endrum, Engal Aandavaraagiya Karththarin Karpanaigalaiyum Sagala Needhinyaayangalaiyum, Kattalaigalaiyum Ellaam Kaikkondu, Avaigalinpadi Seyvom Endrum,
30 naangal Engal Kumaaraththigalai Dhesaththin Janangalukkuk Kodaamalum, Engal Kumaararukku Avargal Kumaaraththigalaik Kollaamalum Iruppom Endrum,

31 dhesaththin Janangal Oivunaalile Sarakkugalaiyum, Endhavidhath Dhaaniyadhavasaththaiyum Virkiradharkuk Konduvandhaal, Naangal Adhai Oivunaalilum Parisuththanaalilum Avargal Kaiyil Kollaadhiruppom Endrum, Naangal Ezhaam Varushaththai Vidudhalai Varushamaakki Sagala Kadangalaiyum Vittuviduvom Endrum Aanaiyittup Pramaanampanninaargal.

32 melum: Naangal Engal Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththin Aaraadhanaikkaaga Samugaththappangalukkum, Niththiyapojanapalikkum Oivunaatkalilum Maadhappirappugalilum Seluththum Niththiya Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalukkum Pandigaigalukkum, Pradhishtaiyaana Porulgalukkum, Isravelukkaaga Paavanivirththi Undaakkum Paligalukkum,
33 engal Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththin Sagala Velaikkum, Varushandhorum Naangal Sekkalil Moondril Oru Pangaik Koduppom Engira Kadanai Engalmel Etrukkondom.

34 nyaayappramaanaththil Ezhudhiyirukkirapadiye Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Palipeedaththinmel Erigiradharkaaga, Kurikkappatta Kaalangalil Varushaavarusham Engal Pidhaakkaludaiya Kudumbangalinpadiye, Engal Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththukku Konduvaravendiya Viragu Kaanikkaikkaagavum, Aasaariyarukkum, Leviyarukkum, Janaththukkum Seettuppottom.
35 naangal Varushandhorum Engal Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththukku Engal Dhesaththin Mudharpalanaiyum, Sagalavidha Virutchangalin Ellaa Mudharkanigalaiyum Konduvaravum,

36 nyaayappramaanaththil Ezhudhiyirukkirapadiye, Engal Kumaararil Mudharperugalaiyum, Engal Aadumaadugalaagiya Mirugajeevangalin Thalaiyeetrugalaiyum, Engal Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththukkum Engal Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththile Oozhiyancheygira Aasaariyaridaththukkum Konduvaravum,

37 naangal Engal Pisaindhamaavil Mudharpaagaththaiyum Engal Padaippugalaiyum, Sagala Marangalin Mundhina Balanaagiya Dhraatchappazharasaththaiyum Enneyaiyum, Engal Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththin Araigalil Vaikkumpadi Aasaariyaridaththukkum, Engal Nilappayirgalil Thasamapaagam Leviyaridaththirkum Konduvaravum, Leviyaraagiya Ivargal Engal Vellaanmaiyin Pattanangalilellaam Thasamapaagam Serkkavum,

38 leviyar Thasamapaagam Serkkumpodhu Aaronin Kumaaranaagiya Oru Aasaariyan Leviyarodekooda Irukkavum, Thasamapaagamaagiya Adhile Leviyar Paththil Oru Pangai Engal Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththilulla Pokkisha Araigalil Konduvaravum Thittampannikkondom.

39 parisuththa Sthalaththin Panimuttugalum, Oozhiyancheygira Aasaariyarum Vaasal Kaavalaalarum, Paadagarum Irukkira Andha Araigalile Isravel Puththirarum Levipuththirarum Dhaaniyam Dhraatcharasam Enney Enbavaigalin Padaippugalaik Konduvaravendiyadhu; Ivvidhamaai Naangal Engal Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththaip Paraamariyaamal Viduvadhillaiyendru Thittampannikkondom.
